data.eml:eml: New data on millipedes of the family Julidae (Diplopoda, Julida) from Altai, Siberia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mikhaljova, Elena V., Nefediev, Pavel S., Nefedieva, Julia S. (2007): New data on millipedes of the family Julidae (Diplopoda, Julida) from Altai, Siberia. Zootaxa 1541: 57-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177847
